title: A Pool For Two?
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ou97I0

by PinkEasterEggs

Peter Stark knew that he wasn’t allowed outside their Malibu mansion without his father’s approval. But he decided that his dad couldn’t be too mad because all he wanted to do was splash about in the pool for a little while. Last summer Peter hadn’t been all that confident in the water, shying away from the newly built slides and rides. This year, however, Peter was older and far more experienced. And man did he wanna go down those water slides.

Or

Peter just wants to go for a swim; too bad his dad stops him– or does he?

Words: 1562, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes (mentioned)

  • Additional Tags: Peter Parker is Tony Stark’s Biological Child, Holidays, Swimming Pools, Peter just wants to swim, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark is Good With Kids, Family Feels, Kid Peter Parker, Precious Peter Parker

body:
Health Troubles (Steve Rogers x Reader)

Summary: A health issue comes up while Steve is on a mission.

A/N: Hi  I suck at titles but here you guys go, hope you guys enjoy :) Also I’m not a doctor so idk if this is accurate (I mean I’ve watched 15 seasons of Greys Anatomy)

“Stop playing with your IV’’ Peter spoke making y/n roll her eyes.

Y/n sighed as she laid on the hospital bed, she heard Nat’s voice as the nurse instructed them to the room she was in. Once they made the sharp turn into the room she saw their faces: Tony and Nat.  

“You called them?” she asked as Tony stared at her, she was in a hospital gown hooked up to an IV and monitors that detected different things. Peter shrugged and looked away, Tony mouthed a thank you to him as he stood up and offered his seat to Nat. Tony could see how tired she was, she had bags under her eyes and a red puffy nose. “I keep telling them I’m fine”

“This does not sound fine to me” Nat countered as Peter walked over and took a seat on the foot of the hospital bed. Y/n leaned her head back and watched as the nurse came in to check on her vitals.

‘’It’s just the stomach flu” y/n reasoned as Tony watched the nurse, the nurse only shook her head at y/n’s stubbornness “can I go home now?’’ she asked, she wished the answer to be an immediate, yes but the nurse hesitated.

“You’re pretty dehydrated, hows the nausea?’’ she asked as y/n groaned, Tony watched as Peter played with her hand.

“Subsided’’ she answered, the nurse moved the small blanket aside and pressed on her right side.

“Does it hurt when I press he-’’ before she could finish y/n hissed out, Nat crossed her arms over her chest and waited for the nurse to do something else. The nurse processed the information and gave her a nod. “I’ll get a doctor in here as soon as I can” she smiled before walking out. Tony turned to y/n and raised his eyebrow.

“I still can’t believe you called them” she muttered over to the teenage boy who was scrolling through his phone. He shrugged and looked over to Tony for help.

“No, no don’t blame him he found you unconscious. You should be thanking him for calling us’’ tony pointed as y/n rolled her eyes.

“Just wait until Steve gets here’’ nat snickered, y/n’s eyes widened as she leaned forward and snapped her head to peter.

“You called Steve?’’ she asked, Peter’s mouth hung open, his eyes darted between her and Nat’s who had a sly smirk on her face. “He’s on a mission”, she finished as she exhaled sharply from the pain and brought her hand to her forehead. Before she could say anything one of the doctors walked in and smiled at all of them, quickly recognizing Tony who just gave him a tight smile.

“Ms. Y/L/N, I’m doctor Dorian, I’m here to go over your prognosis.” he introduced himself as he stood in front of the bed. “Looks like you have a very simple case of appendicitis, but we’re going to order a CT scan to make sure. We’ll go from there” he explained as she nodded and sighed.

The doctor excused himself, Tony gave her a reassuring smile before taking a seat on the small recliner in the corner of the room. She wasn’t too worried about her health, Steve, however, that was a whole different story. Y/n sighed and closed her eyes thinking about the show Steve would put on when he arrived.

*

It wasn’t until a couple hours after the doctor had first come in that the reality of her pain sunk in. Even on a morphine drip, she felt every single ounce of pain. Nat had to leave and fix a problem at the tower, Peter and tony on the other hand were her “pain support buddies”- as Peter had jokingly put it.

By the time the actual pain kicked in, Peter and Tony really wanted to get out of the room. Every time the pain came she would squeeze either of their arms and Peter for sure thought she was going to. By the time the doctor came back, he came bearing the news that she would need surgery.

“Just give me more pain meds’’ she spoke, her voice low and raspy from the pain. The doctor glanced between her and Tony who shook his head “Can it go away on its own?’’ she asked as she shifted her weight and let go of Peter’s arm. Quickly Peter took his arm and rubbed it.

“I’m afraid that’s not an option Ms. Y/L/N’’ he reasoned, Tony sighed and walked towards the bed. “I’ll get a nurse to help prep you for the surgery, won’t take too long. I’ll be back in a bit’’ he announced as she gave him a nod and turned to Tony.

‘’Rogers will be here soon, you just go in there and you get better Y/n’’ Tony spoke as he placed his hand on her head. Peter gave her a small smile and a reassuring nod.

“Fine,” she breathed out and brought her hand up to her nose and gave it a scratch. “But I’m gonna be complaining the whole time afterward’’ she sighed as she shifted in the bed, Peter chuckled and put a hand on her shoulder.

“If he gets here before, we’ll calm him down’’ Peter reassured making her nod and wince at another sharp pain. “Don’t worry.”

*

When y/n awoke, she felt sore all over. She turned her head to the side and glanced down to her arm and noticed the IV in her arm. The slight beeping of the monitors above her head. She tried to move but felt pain on her right side. HIssing at the pain she laid her head back on the pillow and closed her eyes.

“Hey,’’ she heard a whisper, a voice she knew so well. Turning she saw Steve standing next to the bed with a small smile on his face. He leaned in and placed a kiss on her forehead, she hummed in response with a smile of her own. “Gave me quite the scare there’’ he whispered, a small chuckle following.

“Sorry,’’ she responded, her voice low and raspy. Steve shook his head and place his hand on hers “I should probably schedule my next organ removal when you’re not on a mission’’ she jokingly added making Steve laugh lowly and lean in to place his lips on hers and gave her a quick peck.

“Yeah, please do’’ he finished making her roll her eyes and lean back.

Summary: A health issue comes up while Steve is on a mission.

A/N: Hi  I suck at titles but here you guys go, hope you guys enjoy :) Also I’m not a doctor so idk if this is accurate (I mean I’ve watched 15 seasons of Greys Anatomy)

“Stop playing with your IV’’ Peter spoke making y/n roll her eyes.

Y/n sighed as she laid on the hospital bed, she heard Nat’s voice as the nurse instructed them to the room she was in. Once they made the sharp turn into the room she saw their faces: Tony and Nat.  

“You called them?” she asked as Tony stared at her, she was in a hospital gown hooked up to an IV and monitors that detected different things. Peter shrugged and looked away, Tony mouthed a thank you to him as he stood up and offered his seat to Nat. Tony could see how tired she was, she had bags under her eyes and a red puffy nose. “I keep telling them I’m fine”

“This does not sound fine to me” Nat countered as Peter walked over and took a seat on the foot of the hospital bed. Y/n leaned her head back and watched as the nurse came in to check on her vitals.

‘’It’s just the stomach flu” y/n reasoned as Tony watched the nurse, the nurse only shook her head at y/n’s stubbornness “can I go home now?’’ she asked, she wished the answer to be an immediate, yes but the nurse hesitated.

“You’re pretty dehydrated, hows the nausea?’’ she asked as y/n groaned, Tony watched as Peter played with her hand.

“Subsided’’ she answered, the nurse moved the small blanket aside and pressed on her right side.

“Does it hurt when I press he-’’ before she could finish y/n hissed out, Nat crossed her arms over her chest and waited for the nurse to do something else. The nurse processed the information and gave her a nod. “I’ll get a doctor in here as soon as I can” she smiled before walking out. Tony turned to y/n and raised his eyebrow.

“I still can’t believe you called them” she muttered over to the teenage boy who was scrolling through his phone. He shrugged and looked over to Tony for help.

“No, no don’t blame him he found you unconscious. You should be thanking him for calling us’’ tony pointed as y/n rolled her eyes.

“Just wait until Steve gets here’’ nat snickered, y/n’s eyes widened as she leaned forward and snapped her head to peter.

“You called Steve?’’ she asked, Peter’s mouth hung open, his eyes darted between her and Nat’s who had a sly smirk on her face. “He’s on a mission”, she finished as she exhaled sharply from the pain and brought her hand to her forehead. Before she could say anything one of the doctors walked in and smiled at all of them, quickly recognizing Tony who just gave him a tight smile.

“Ms. Y/L/N, I’m doctor Dorian, I’m here to go over your prognosis.” he introduced himself as he stood in front of the bed. “Looks like you have a very simple case of appendicitis, but we’re going to order a CT scan to make sure. We’ll go from there” he explained as she nodded and sighed.

The doctor excused himself, Tony gave her a reassuring smile before taking a seat on the small recliner in the corner of the room. She wasn’t too worried about her health, Steve, however, that was a whole different story. Y/n sighed and closed her eyes thinking about the show Steve would put on when he arrived.

*

It wasn’t until a couple hours after the doctor had first come in that the reality of her pain sunk in. Even on a morphine drip, she felt every single ounce of pain. Nat had to leave and fix a problem at the tower, Peter and tony on the other hand were her “pain support buddies”- as Peter had jokingly put it.

By the time the actual pain kicked in, Peter and Tony really wanted to get out of the room. Every time the pain came she would squeeze either of their arms and Peter for sure thought she was going to. By the time the doctor came back, he came bearing the news that she would need surgery.

“Just give me more pain meds’’ she spoke, her voice low and raspy from the pain. The doctor glanced between her and Tony who shook his head “Can it go away on its own?’’ she asked as she shifted her weight and let go of Peter’s arm. Quickly Peter took his arm and rubbed it.

“I’m afraid that’s not an option Ms. Y/L/N’’ he reasoned, Tony sighed and walked towards the bed. “I’ll get a nurse to help prep you for the surgery, won’t take too long. I’ll be back in a bit’’ he announced as she gave him a nod and turned to Tony.

‘’Rogers will be here soon, you just go in there and you get better Y/n’’ Tony spoke as he placed his hand on her head. Peter gave her a small smile and a reassuring nod.

“Fine,” she breathed out and brought her hand up to her nose and gave it a scratch. “But I’m gonna be complaining the whole time afterward’’ she sighed as she shifted in the bed, Peter chuckled and put a hand on her shoulder.

“If he gets here before, we’ll calm him down’’ Peter reassured making her nod and wince at another sharp pain. “Don’t worry.”

*

When y/n awoke, she felt sore all over. She turned her head to the side and glanced down to her arm and noticed the IV in her arm. The slight beeping of the monitors above her head. She tried to move but felt pain on her right side. HIssing at the pain she laid her head back on the pillow and closed her eyes.

“Hey,’’ she heard a whisper, a voice she knew so well. Turning she saw Steve standing next to the bed with a small smile on his face. He leaned in and placed a kiss on her forehead, she hummed in response with a smile of her own. “Gave me quite the scare there’’ he whispered, a small chuckle following.

“Sorry,’’ she responded, her voice low and raspy. Steve shook his head and place his hand on hers “I should probably schedule my next organ removal when you’re not on a mission’’ she jokingly added making Steve laugh lowly and lean in to place his lips on hers and gave her a quick peck.

“Yeah, please do’’ he finished making her roll her eyes and lean back.

Series: Part 1 of Historic Features
Summary:

“Electrical surges with no source, and music coming from the air, and that damn baseball game no one was watching, and I swear I sometimes hear voices right on the edge of hearing when I should be alone,” said Tony. “What does that sound like to you?” 

“Sounds like-” said Steve, then hesitated. Tony gave him a pointed look. “Sounds like a haunting,” he finished, reluctantly. 

“Oh no,” said Clint, in tones of mock-horror. “Ghosts!” 

Bucky laughed and kissed him. “Man, I hope they’re friendly.”

 
Clint and Bucky are haunting the new apartment that Tony bought in Brooklyn to try and impress Steve.

I know I did not program ‘bitchy’ in there. I know this, I was there for the programming.”
“My programming is quite adaptable, sir. I learn from my environment and my interactions with others.”
“Are you calling me bitchy?”
“Perish the thought, sir.

The Act of Creation Will Be Your Salvation by scifigrl47 (AO3)
Iron Man/Avengers (Marvel Movies) – Mature – Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
#Alternate Universe #Angst #History #Behind the Scenes #Bot-feels #Tony Stark Has Issues #Friends to Lovers #Tony-Centric #Dummy-Centric

When Tony Stark was seventeen years old, he built his first AI. On that day, he ceased to be his father’s creation, and became a creating force in his own right.

That one act likely saved his life, and not always in the most obvious ways.

summary: Roswell and MCU 27, 26, 13 (tony stark), 12 (for mcu, though if you feel Roswell go ahead), 1. Salty ask!
question: Roswell and MCU 27, 26, 13 (tony stark), 12 (for mcu, though if you feel Roswell go ahead), 1. Salty ask!
answer:
• Least shippable character?

With the MCU I’m only gonna go with lead characters, because if I start thinking of secondary characters and antagonist we’re getting into the infinite amount of unshippability in this ‘verse lol. And the answer is Strange xDD. It’s a pity because I’m pretty sure that, had another actor being cast for the role, I might feel very different about the character (for one, I’m pretty sure in another universe, I could’ve been into Mordo/Strange), but alas.

In Roswell: Max. I can’t stand the guy, what can I say xD

  • Most shippable character? 

I’m ready to crack-ship Tony with almost anyone he has an interesting scene with lol (and if you add the comics/animated shows I’m trying out… the list is only growing). Tho as you all know, Pepper and Rhodey are his True Loves, no contestants.

I guess Kyle and Michael? In the sense that I enjoy two different ships for them (Kyle/Liz and Alex/Kyle; Maria/Michael and Alex/Michael) –even if, after the last two eps (where Kyle was a mouthpiece for Alex/Michael and with the Alex & Maria scene), the Alex-related ships are on thin ice xDD

Now that I think about it, I’m ready to crack/spite-ship Kyle/Michael; I’m always down for hate!sex tbh.

  • Unpopular opinion about Tony Stark?

I have a completely skewed view of this fandom; I have virtually no idea of what is or isn’t popular xD. And I mean, unpopular among whom? Tumblr, which has a sizeable Tony hatedom -thought I don’t think they’re a majority by any means- and seems more inclined towards Steve? MCU fans in general, among whom Tony is so loved they sometimes react as if he was a real person (the reactions in RL to the Pepperony engagement and the whole NASA/Tony thing was a joy to watch ngl xD)? Specific Tony-fans on tumblr, from whom I’ve seen takes I don’t really agree with, but that also have posted rebuttal posts with hundreds of thousands of notes with which I do? IDEK.

I guess I’m far more into Iron Husbands and far less into (MCU) Steve/Tony than a good size of Tony’s fans? But seriously, they’re so numerous that any possible interpretation of the character gets a lot of people behind it and I’m bound to agree with some of them xDD

Errr… okay, I think he has a lot in common with one of my other all-time-faves, Commander Vimes from Discworld. I’m putting this in unpopular because I remember seeing, a long time ago, a post with thousands upon thousands of notes that said that Vimes was similar to Steve. This was before I was familiarized with the universe but already knew enough about Steve through comics/the few movies I’d watched, but my reaction was still “err. no?”. There are a few superficial back-story details there, but in terms of what moves the characters, their ~pathos, their development, even several key plot points in their journey over several books that are so similar it’s ridiculous (one day I have do a post about this xDD), Vimes and Tony have TONS more in common; they’re cut from the same cloth IMO.

(btw, Don Cheadle is one of my preferred fancasts for Sam Vimes -I think he’d NAIL IT and I know the upcoming adaptation is gonna disappoint me when they don’t choose him/Andre Braugher/Sterling K. Brown. I just thought it was very important for everyone to read this xD)

  • Is there an unpopular arc that you like that the fandom doesn’t? Why?

I actually liked both Ant-Man movies quite a lot? I get why people were opposed to them, and I especially sympathy with the fans that hate how they participated in Jan’s exclusion (though I’ve seen a theory of how she could be behind the Avenger name all along and I’m running with it lol), but I think their emotional arcs are pretty on point and the father-daughter motif really works on me *shrugs*.

And wrt, I mean. I love Maria/Michael and you’ve seen the fandom xD

  • What OTPs in your fandom(s) do you just not get?

I usually “get” ships in the sense that I get where fandom is coming from when I see them, even when our interpretations of canon events are wildly different or I still don’t find them interesting. So, by some definition of “get”, I guess I don’t get why RNM is writing Isobel/Rosa, especially in light of the way they did it in the last ep? I was never going to like that ship because I’m very protective of Rosa when it comes to the pod people lol, and I get “if I can’t have her no one can” was never going to be a place the writers were gonna choose for Isobel, but still.

In MCU… Bucky/Tony (strictly in the MCU, because for what I’ve seen of 616, I might actually find that interesting as a rare/crack-ship). I want to make it clear that I don’t object to the ship for ~moral reasons because that’s… never my issue with any ship, ever, and because I don’t really care why people may or may not like it, and I would never attack them or think badly of them for the ship. It just causes an EXTREME irrational gut-reaction from me? Like, I don’t even want to see Tony forced to endure Bucky’s presence LMAO, and the thought of them as a romantic pair literally puts an endless loop of “those hands killed Tony’s mother” on my brain and. Nope. I was just reminded of it today because a post got past my blacklist in one of Tony’s tags and I had to block it + add more stuff lol.

(Standard disclaimer about how Bucky isn’t to blame for what happened, amnesia brainwashing agency blah blah, Tony was in the wrong for attacking him etc. etc., but still. My irrational and immediate gut feeling is Nope.)

reblog.comment:
• Least shippable character?

With the MCU I’m only gonna go with lead characters, because if I start thinking of secondary characters and antagonist we’re getting into the infinite amount of unshippability in this ‘verse lol. And the answer is Strange xDD. It’s a pity because I’m pretty sure that, had another actor being cast for the role, I might feel very different about the character (for one, I’m pretty sure in another universe, I could’ve been into Mordo/Strange), but alas.

In Roswell: Max. I can’t stand the guy, what can I say xD

  • Most shippable character? 

I’m ready to crack-ship Tony with almost anyone he has an interesting scene with lol (and if you add the comics/animated shows I’m trying out… the list is only growing). Tho as you all know, Pepper and Rhodey are his True Loves, no contestants.

I guess Kyle and Michael? In the sense that I enjoy two different ships for them (Kyle/Liz and Alex/Kyle; Maria/Michael and Alex/Michael) –even if, after the last two eps (where Kyle was a mouthpiece for Alex/Michael and with the Alex & Maria scene), the Alex-related ships are on thin ice xDD

Now that I think about it, I’m ready to crack/spite-ship Kyle/Michael; I’m always down for hate!sex tbh.

  • Unpopular opinion about Tony Stark?

I have a completely skewed view of this fandom; I have virtually no idea of what is or isn’t popular xD. And I mean, unpopular among whom? Tumblr, which has a sizeable Tony hatedom -thought I don’t think they’re a majority by any means- and seems more inclined towards Steve? MCU fans in general, among whom Tony is so loved they sometimes react as if he was a real person (the reactions in RL to the Pepperony engagement and the whole NASA/Tony thing was a joy to watch ngl xD)? Specific Tony-fans on tumblr, from whom I’ve seen takes I don’t really agree with, but that also have posted rebuttal posts with hundreds of thousands of notes with which I do? IDEK.

I guess I’m far more into Iron Husbands and far less into (MCU) Steve/Tony than a good size of Tony’s fans? But seriously, they’re so numerous that any possible interpretation of the character gets a lot of people behind it and I’m bound to agree with some of them xDD

Errr… okay, I think he has a lot in common with one of my other all-time-faves, Commander Vimes from Discworld. I’m putting this in unpopular because I remember seeing, a long time ago, a post with thousands upon thousands of notes that said that Vimes was similar to Steve. This was before I was familiarized with the universe but already knew enough about Steve through comics/the few movies I’d watched, but my reaction was still “err. no?”. There are a few superficial back-story details there, but in terms of what moves the characters, their ~pathos, their development, even several key plot points in their journey over several books that are so similar it’s ridiculous (one day I have do a post about this xDD), Vimes and Tony have TONS more in common; they’re cut from the same cloth IMO.

(btw, Don Cheadle is one of my preferred fancasts for Sam Vimes -I think he’d NAIL IT and I know the upcoming adaptation is gonna disappoint me when they don’t choose him/Andre Braugher/Sterling K. Brown. I just thought it was very important for everyone to read this xD)

  • Is there an unpopular arc that you like that the fandom doesn’t? Why?

I actually liked both Ant-Man movies quite a lot? I get why people were opposed to them, and I especially sympathy with the fans that hate how they participated in Jan’s exclusion (though I’ve seen a theory of how she could be behind the Avenger name all along and I’m running with it lol), but I think their emotional arcs are pretty on point and the father-daughter motif really works on me *shrugs*.

And wrt, I mean. I love Maria/Michael and you’ve seen the fandom xD

  • What OTPs in your fandom(s) do you just not get?

I usually “get” ships in the sense that I get where fandom is coming from when I see them, even when our interpretations of canon events are wildly different or I still don’t find them interesting. So, by some definition of “get”, I guess I don’t get why RNM is writing Isobel/Rosa, especially in light of the way they did it in the last ep? I was never going to like that ship because I’m very protective of Rosa when it comes to the pod people lol, and I get “if I can’t have her no one can” was never going to be a place the writers were gonna choose for Isobel, but still.

In MCU… Bucky/Tony (strictly in the MCU, because for what I’ve seen of 616, I might actually find that interesting as a rare/crack-ship). I want to make it clear that I don’t object to the ship for ~moral reasons because that’s… never my issue with any ship, ever, and because I don’t really care why people may or may not like it, and I would never attack them or think badly of them for the ship. It just causes an EXTREME irrational gut-reaction from me? Like, I don’t even want to see Tony forced to endure Bucky’s presence LMAO, and the thought of them as a romantic pair literally puts an endless loop of “those hands killed Tony’s mother” on my brain and. Nope. I was just reminded of it today because a post got past my blacklist in one of Tony’s tags and I had to block it + add more stuff lol.

(Standard disclaimer about how Bucky isn’t to blame for what happened, amnesia brainwashing agency blah blah, Tony was in the wrong for attacking him etc. etc., but still. My irrational and immediate gut feeling is Nope.)
